name: Cheese Pizza
description: A classic favorite featuring a delicious blend of melted cheese on a crispy crust. Perfect for pizza enthusiasts!

name: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad with crisp romaine lettuce, savory Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. A delightful choice for a light and satisfying meal.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Indulge your sweet tooth with our decadent chocolate cake. Moist layers of chocolate goodness that will satisfy any dessert craving.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A cool and refreshing beverage to perk up your day. Made with the finest coffee beans and served over ice. Vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free for all to enjoy.

name: Caprese Wrap
description: A delicious wrap filled with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze. A flavorful choice for a wholesome lunch.

name: Green Tea
description: Rejuvenate with our soothing green tea. A delightful blend that's not only refreshing but also vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic pizza with the bold flavor of pepperoni. Satisfy your pizza cravings with this savory choice.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Tropical delight in a glass! Our mango smoothie is a refreshing blend of ripe mangoes, perfect as a beverage or snack.

name: Tiramisu
description: Indulge in the classic Italian dessert, Tiramisu. Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, topped with cocoa powder.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A delightful vegetarian option with a variety of fresh vegetables on a crispy crust. Perfect for those who love a veggie-packed pizza.
